document.name: Individual PURL Administration Form

functionality.item: Collect PURL information via a form for further processing.
Use AJAX methods to allow for any action on a PURL (create, modify, search, delete or validate).
NB: Creation may take several forms, depending on parameters: simple, partial redirect, chain, clone.

document.assumptions: This page is served by a Web server and is URL addressable.
document.preconditions: Requests for modification or deletion require that a PURL already exist.
document.postconditions: A new PURL may be created upon creation request.
